# Changelog

This folder contains a chronological record of all major changes to the project.

## How to Use

- **View all changes**: Browse files sorted by timestamp (newest first)
- **Add new entry**: Create a new file with format `YYYY-MM-DD-HHMM-description.md`
- **Quick overview**: See the "Recent Changes" section below

---

## File Naming Convention

Format: `YYYY-MM-DD-HHMM-description.md`

Examples:
- `2024-01-15-1430-added-user-authentication.md`
- `2024-01-20-0915-fixed-screenshot-api-bug.md`
- `2024-02-01-1600-implemented-brand-filtering.md`

## What to Document

Include major changes such as:
- ✅ New features
- ✅ Breaking changes
- ✅ Major bug fixes
- ✅ Infrastructure/deployment changes
- ✅ Security updates
- ✅ API changes

You can skip:
- ❌ Minor UI tweaks
- ❌ Routine bug fixes
- ❌ Code refactoring (unless it affects functionality)
